document_data.caption: A map of Mulhorand showing Delgora near the mouth of the River of Spears.
document_data.name: Delgora
document_data.mainbody: '''Delgora''' was a small town located in the country of [[Mulhorand]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dlc}}
document_data.Geography: Delgora was a coastal town located in western Mulhorand along the southeastern coast of the [[Alamber Sea]] northwest of the mouth of the [[River of Spears]]. It lay between [[Neldorild]] to the northwest and [[Gheldaneth]] to the southeast.
document_data.Activities: Mulhorand's prime fishing fleet was based in Delgora.
